quote: And to Caʹleb the son of Je·phunʹneh, he gave a share among the descendants of Judah at the order of Jehovah to Joshua, namely, Kirʹi·ath-arʹba (Arʹba was the father of Aʹnak), that is, Hebʹron.
Since you did not carry it the first time, the anger of Jehovah our God broke out against us, because we did not search out the proper procedure.”
